channel.title: "We've Got Hostiles" Unbreakable Glass
channel.description:
At the start of "We've Got Hostiles" if you toss a grenade down towards the trip mine (that usually kills the scientist) and trigger the Fire Door, the glass on the door opener is unbreakable and you can't proceed
[img]https://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/568898774385147571/27349BBD95631AC9A006B072959520312AEEBD87/[/img]
[img]https://cloud-2.steampowered.com/ugc/568898774385153758/671648D695B4F975FFC4C127A2B3877C5CBC33FF/[/img]

item.title: "We've Got Hostiles" Unbreakable Glass
item.dc:creator: deadlife101
item.description:
Yeah I am aware, I just thought I’d put it out there in case he or someone else needed it.

Read full topic

item.title: "We've Got Hostiles" Unbreakable Glass
item.dc:creator: Dadster
item.description:
deadlife101:

The only workaround I could find for this is to crouch right in front of it and then look up at it and press the use key (default E) which opens the door. I hope that helps.

Or you could use sv_cheats 1 and then type noclip.

Although I’m sure your workaround is appreciated, I think the sole purpose of Hawk-kun’s post is as a bug report for the Devs to investigate.

Read full topic
